text:
@TrumpWarRoom @maddow She’s 100% correct..... 02/28/20 at a rally...... (Coronavirus) is their new hoax.

Typical Trump.... count on the idea that my base is not smart enough to check and just dumb enough to take me at my word and LIE, LIE, LIE

Lie my fat ass off!!!!

#TRUMPVIRUS
